## Project: Fire & Smoke Detection WebApp
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript, TailwindCSS, shadcn/ui
- Role-based authentication (User, Admin, First Responder)
- Serverless API routes with mock JSON data
- Fire safety incident management system
